name: Stormshield 4.X Graylog Content Pack
summary: Stormshield Content Pack with INPUT, STREAM, PIPELINE and DASHBOARDS

source.@value:
pipeline "Stormshield Parser"
stage 0 match either
rule "Stormshield Parser"
end

summary.@value: Statistiques firewall du jour et J-1

description.@value: Règle pipeline qui permet d'extraire les champ/valeur.

source.@value:
rule "Stormshield Parser"

when
has_field("message") AND contains(to_string($message.source),"firewall.lab.lan")

then
set_fields(
		fields:
				key_value(
					value: to_string($message.message),
					trim_value_chars: "\"",
					trim_key_chars:"",
					delimiters:" ",
					kv_delimiters:"="
					)
		);
end
